title: Getting Started with Machine Learning
body: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. It involves algorithms that can identify patterns in data and make predictions or decisions based on those patterns. Popular applications include recommendation systems, image recognition, and natural language processing.

title: Top 5 Travel Destinations for 2025
body: This year's must-visit destinations include Iceland for its stunning natural landscapes, Japan for its rich culture and cherry blossoms, New Zealand for adventure activities, Portugal for its historic cities and coastal beauty, and Vietnam for its delicious cuisine and affordable travel costs. Each destination offers unique experiences that cater to different types of travelers.

title: Healthy Meal Prep Ideas
body: Meal prepping can save time and help maintain a healthy diet throughout the week. Start with batch cooking proteins like grilled chicken or baked salmon. Prepare versatile ingredients like quinoa, roasted vegetables, and fresh salads. Store everything in portion-controlled containers and mix and match throughout the week for variety.
